CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External',SHS_Name1__c &' '& SHS_Name2__c &' '& SHS_Name3__c, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Siemens_Healthineers',SHS_Short_name__c, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Siemens',SHS_Short_name__c, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'P40_Account',SHS_Name1__c &' '& SHS_Name2__c &' '& SHS_Name3__c,NULL))))
CustomField.label: Name (alternative)
